text: E'ina hu'neankino Ra Anumzamo'a nehazave raminkura musena hunozmanteno, megusa mofavre naga'ene kento a'nenena asuragi ozmantegahie. Na'ankure maka vahe'mo'za neginagi nanekege nehu'za, Anumzamofo avu'avara amagera nonte'za havi zamavu'zamava hu'naze. E'ina rimpa ahe'zamo'a vagaoresnigeno, azana erisga huno rusuteteno manigahie.
